title: Guard Your Heart: Start Thinking Overcoming Thoughts | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Guard Your Heart: Start Thinking Overcoming Thoughts | Victoria Osteen
description:
Our lives follow the direction of our thoughts. If we’re going to become everything God called us to be, we have to be mindful of what we think.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
